```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
library(tidyverse)
library(ggthemes)

```

```{r car-plot}
mtcars|> 
select(mpg, wt)|>  
ggplot(aes(x = wt, y = mpg)) + 
geom_point() + 
geom_smooth(method = "lm", formula = y~x, se = FALSE) + 
theme_clean() + 
labs(title = "Adding Visualizations Plot", x = "Weight", y = "MPG", caption = "McCars")

```
